long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The VozTelecom CRM integration plugin adds click to dial and real time notifications of incoming and outgoing calls to your CRM. Install this plugin if you have a supported CRM and you are a customer of VozTelecom to increase your productivity and keep track of each and every call made from your telephony service, no matter if mobile, fixed of made from a softphone. The application is currently in Beta.
